special_powers.name: DOUBLE AGENT
special_powers.description: Black Widow can use Shape Change and Stealth. When she uses Shape Change and succeeds, Black Widow can't be targeted by opposing characters this turn.

special_powers.name: WIDOW'S BITE
special_powers.description: Black Widow can use Poison, but may be given the free action to activate it at any time during your turn.

special_powers.name: LIKE FISH IN A BARREL
special_powers.description: If Hawkeye targets a single character when making a ranged combat attack, modify his attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: TRICK SHOOTING
special_powers.description: Give Hawkeye a power action to place an Aim token on this card. At the beginning of your turn, if he has 1 or more Aim tokens on this card you may remove them and choose one effect that Hawkeye can use this turn: Improved Targeting: Ignores Elevated Terrain, Improved Targeting: Ignores Outdoor Blocking Terrain, or a locked range value of 14.

special_powers.name: INCITE HATRED
special_powers.description: Give Son of the Serpent a power action and choose a color other than white that hasn't been chosen this turn for this effect. This turn, when another character named Son of the Serpent makes an attack, modify his attack and damage values by +1 for each power of the chosen color the target possesses.

special_powers.name: RED TEAM
special_powers.description: Scarlet Spider can use Sidestep if he is adjacent to another friendly character named Scarlet Spider.

special_powers.name: YOU HAVE ANOTHER CLONE?
special_powers.description: Scarlet Spider can use Regeneration. When he does and the result is 1, you may choose to place him into your starting area on his starting click.

special_powers.name: MICHAEL, VAN, PATRICK
special_powers.description: Scarlet Spider can use Shape Change. He succeeds on a result of 4 - 6 if another friendly character named Scarlet Spider is on the map.

special_powers.name: THE SUIT IS FOR YOUR PROTECTION, NOT MINE
special_powers.description: When Hazmat takes damage from an attack, after actions resolve deal 1 penetrating damage to all adjacent opposing characters.

special_powers.name: TOXICITY
special_powers.description: Hazmat can use Poison, and deals penetrating damage when using it.

special_powers.name: AS LONG AS IT'S NOT YOU
special_powers.description: Friendly characters named Hazmat with line of fire to Mettle can use Mastermind, but only to deal damage to Mettle regardless of point value or adjacency. When Hazmat uses Mastermind in this way, after actions resolve you may place Mettle adjacent to her if he isn't already.

special_powers.name: THE EVOLUTIONARY PATH OF THE AMULET
special_powers.description: Reptil can use Shape Change. Once per game when he would be KO'd, you may instead turn the dial to click #5 or #9 even if this ability is being ignored.

special_powers.name: WINGSPAN
special_powers.description: Reptil can use Sidestep and has "transporter wing symbol".

special_powers.name: THIS ARMOR IS AWSOME
special_powers.description: Turbo can use Energy Shield/Deflection. When Turbo makes a close combat attack and hits, after actions resolve she can use Force Blast as a free action targeting a single hit character.

special_powers.name: PHOTOGRAPHIC REFLEXES
special_powers.description: Echo can use Combat Reflexes. Give Echo a free action and choose a character with one or more action tokens within 6 squares and line of fire. Choose a standard attack or damage power that character can use. Echo can use that power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: DEMON SIGHT
special_powers.description: Adjacent opposing characters can't use Shape Change.

special_powers.name: FASTER THAN YOU EXPECTED?
special_powers.description: Triathlon can use Charge and Flurry.

special_powers.name: SEE A PERSON'S TRUE FORM AND INTENT
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 6 squares and line of fire can't use Shape Change or Stealth. Friendly characters within line of fire may modify their defense values by +2 when targeted by Mind Control.

special_powers.name: THREE TIMES PEAK HUMAN
special_powers.description: 3-D Man can use Perplex, but only to target himself. He can use it up to 3 times per turn, but can't modify his damage value more than once. When he uses Perplex (no matter how many times), at the end of your turn, roll a d6 and on a result of 1, deal him 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: TELEKINETIC BLAST
special_powers.description: Justice can use Force Blast. When he does, if the knock back is ignored, deal the target 1 penetrating damage and place it into a square adjacent to the one it occupies.

special_powers.name: FLASH-FRY YOUR CIRCUITS
special_powers.description: Living Lightning can use Energy Explosion. When Living Lightning hits an opposing character with the Armor or Robot keyword, increase the damage dealt to that character by 2.

special_powers.name: YOU WOULDN'T LIKE THE RIDE
special_powers.description: Living Lightning can't use the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: MASTER AERIALIST
special_powers.description: When Falcon has no action tokens, Falcon may be given a move action as a free action but he can't use the Carry ability during that move action. When he does, Falcon can use Close Combat Expert this turn.

special_powers.name: VETERAN COMBATANT
special_powers.description: Give Falcon a free action and choose one: Combat Reflexes or Energy Shield/Deflection. Falcon can use the chosen power until he chooses again. When targeted by a ranged attack, Falcon can use Super Senses.

special_powers.name: YOU STOPPED WEARING THE MASK?
special_powers.description: Kate Bishop can use Enhancement. Kate Bishop can use Shape Change if she is adjacent to a friendly character.

special_powers.name: RESURRECT IN MY TOWN, WILL YA?
special_powers.description: A themed team may include Cammi and is still a themed team if it includes a character named Drax or Drax the Destroyer. Adjacent friendly characters named Drax or Drax the Destroyer can use Regeneration. Cammi can use Perplex, but only to target herself or a character named Drax or Drax the Destroyer.

special_powers.name: ANTI-PERSONNEL MINES
special_powers.description: Give Cammi a free action and place a Mine marker in an adjacent unoccupied clear square if there are two or less friendly Mine markers on the map. Even if this power is lost, whenever an opposing character moves through one or more squares containing Cammi's Mine markers and actions resolve, remove those markers from the map and deal that character 3 damage.

special_powers.name: REBUILT FROM THE GROUND UP
special_powers.description: When building your force, choose a friendly character with the Robot keyword. The chosen character is Juston Seyfert's Sentinel.

special_powers.name: PROGRAM IN A NEW PRIME DIRECTIVE
special_powers.description: Give Juston Seyfert a power action if he is adjacent to his Sentinel. When he does, his Sentinel may be given a move action as a free action and then it may make a close or ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: MECHANICAL TINKERER
special_powers.description: Juston Seyfert can use Support, but only to target characters with the Robot keyword. When he does and the character heals, that character modifies its defense value by +2 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: YOU COSTUMED BULLIES GOT MY FATHER KILLED!
special_powers.description: Once per turn when Thunderstrike attacks one or more characters with the Avengers keyword, after actions resolve he may make a close or ranged combat attack targeting a single opposing character with the Avengers keyword as a free action and modifies his attack value by +1 for that attack.

special_powers.name: MACE THROW
special_powers.description: Thunderstrike can use Charge and the Flight ability.

special_powers.name: UH, I GUESS I CAN HEAL TOO?
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, heal Ultragirl of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SMOKE FORM
special_powers.description: Veil can't use the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: HIGHLY-TOXIC CLOUD
special_powers.description: When Veil has less than two action tokens she can use Smoke Cloud as a free action. When she does, deal 1 damage to any opposing character that ends its turn occupying or adjacent to one of these markers.

special_powers.name: HEADLOCK TAKEDOWN
special_powers.description: D-Man can use Plasticity. When he hits an opposing character with a close combat attack, put a Headlock token on their card. Remove all Headlock tokens from characters not adjacent to D-Man. Characters with any Headlock tokens on their card must roll a d6 when given an action. If the result is: 1 - 3, the action ends immediately.; 4 - 6, remove all Headlock tokens from that character's card an the action resolves normally.

special_powers.name: THE DISCIPLINE OF STRENGTH
special_powers.description: Forgotten One can use Super Strength. When Forgotten One destroys blocking terrain and actions resolve, you may roll a d6. On a result of 2 - 4, Forgotten One may be given a standard light object from outside the game. On a result of 5 - 6, Forgotten One may be given a standard heavy object from outside the game.

special_powers.name: PERSONAL MOLECULAR MANIPULATION
special_powers.description: Forgotten one can use Combat Reflexes, Regeneration and Toughness. When Forgotten One uses Regeneration, he heals a minimum of 1.

special_powers.name: UPGRADING PENTA-VISION
special_powers.description: Smasher's range value is equal to her current click number plus 3.

special_powers.name: HEIGHTENED SENSES AND PSI-WEBBING
special_powers.description: Spider-Woman can use Barrier and Super Senses. When Spider-Woman uses Super Senses she succeeds on a result of 4 - 6.

special_powers.name: THE WILD INHERITANCE OF MADAME WEB
special_powers.description: Spider-Woman can use the Mystics team ability. At the beginning of your turn, you may roll a d6, and Spider-Woman can use the following power until you roll again: 1 - 2 Outwit; 3 - 4; Perplex; 5 - 6 Probability Control.

special_powers.name: RIPOSTE
special_powers.description: When Swordsman is the target of a close combat attack and the attacker can use Blades/Claws/Fangs, Close Combat Expert, or Precision Strike, you may roll a d6 after a successful attack but before damage is dealt. If the result is equal to or higher than the attacker's printed damage value, Swordsman is dealt no damage by this attack and the attacker is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: GUSTNADO
special_powers.description: When Whirlwind makes a close combat attack and hits, after actions resolve he can use Force Blast as a free action but only to target a single hit character.

special_powers.name: SPIN FASTER!
special_powers.description: Whirlwind can use Charge and Flurry. When he uses Charge he can use Improved Movement: Hindering, Characters.

special_powers.name: INTANGIBLE FORM
special_powers.description: Moonstone can use Super Senses and Improved Movement: Indoor Blocking.

special_powers.name: PSYCHOLOGICAL MANIPULATION
special_powers.description: Moonstone can use Outwit. When she does, modify the target's defense value by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: UTOPIAN IDEAS
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, if Power Princess didn't attack during your last turn and wasn't hit by an attack since your last turn, heal her of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: RAZOR-EDGE SHIELD TOSS
special_powers.description: Power Princess can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast and has a range value of 7 :bolt::bolt::bolt:.

special_powers.name: UTOPIAN DEFLECTION SHIELD
special_powers.description: When Power Princess is targeted by a ranged combat attack that misses, after actions resolve give the attacker an action token. If the attacker can't be given an action token, deal that character 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: GROWING CONCUSSIVE CHARGE
special_powers.description: When Superia makes an attack and hits, place one Energy token on this card for each hit adjacent character. Superia can use Perplex once for each Energy token she removes from this card, but only to target herself.

special_powers.name: THIS IS HARDLY FAIR, TO GANG UP ON A LADY...
special_powers.description: Superia can use Force Blast and Pulse Wave as if she had a range value of 6.

special_powers.name: PUNY BANNER
special_powers.description: Once per game, when Hulk has 2 action tokens you may give him a free action and turn him to click #11.

special_powers.name: LEAP SMASH!
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Flurry and Leap/Climb. When Hulk uses Leap/Climb, after actions resolve, he can use Quake as a free action.

special_powers.name: YOU WOULDN'T LIKE ME WHEN I'M ANGRY
special_powers.description: When Hulk would take damage from an opposing character, instead turn this dial clockwise a number of clicks equal to 2 plus the amount of damage taken. Hulk isn't KO'd when it reaches a KO click unless he stops turning the dial on that click. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: BRILLIANT SCIENTIFIC MIND
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Outwit and Perplex and has "starburst damage symbol".

special_powers.name: THERE'S STILL A FEW AVENGERS IN THE MANSION LEFT TO HELP
special_powers.description: Jarvis counts as 3 characters for determining how many ID Cards can be added to your force. You don't pay the cost for up to 3 ID Cards added to your force. Your opponent scores these ID Cards normally.

special_powers.name: I TIDIED UP
special_powers.description: Friendly characters can use Improved Movement: Hindering and Improved Targeting: Hindering, but only if they occupy indoor terrain.

special_powers.name: THE HEART OF THE AVENGERS
special_powers.description: When Jarvis is adjacent to a friendly character with the Avengers keyword, reduce all damage dealt to him to 1. If Jarvis has taken damage from an opposing character since the beginning of your last turn, he ignores all damage dealt by opposing characters. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: HALF-HUMAN SHAPESHIFTER
special_powers.description: Hybrid can use Shape Change. Once per turn, if the result is 1, you may reroll it. If he succeeds in his Shape Change roll, heal him of 1 damage and no opposing character can target or deal him damage this turn.

special_powers.name: FEED ON OTHERS' POWERS
special_powers.description: Hybrid can use Outwit. Once per turn, if he uses it to target an adjacent character, he may immediately use it again. Hybrid can use any standard powers he has countered as long as they remain countered.

special_powers.name: THE UNI-POWER
special_powers.description: Give Captain Universe a free action and choose one: Incapacitate with "3 targets", Telekinesis, or the Power Cosmic team ability. Captain Universe can use the chosen effect until she chooses again.

special_powers.name: BALANCE IN THE UNIVERSE
special_powers.description: Captain Universe can use Probability Control. Captain Universe may use it to reroll a Critical Hit or Critical Miss regardless of range or line of fire.

special_powers.name: PORTALS OF SPACE AND TIME
special_powers.description: Manifold can use the Carry ability. When he does, he may carry up to 3 friendly characters regardless of their combat symbols if they each share a keyword with him. When Manifold is given a move action and actions resolve, you may give him a free action and friendly characters adjacent when this action was given modify their defense values by +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: ACTIVE CAMOUFLAGE ARMOR
special_powers.description: Night Thrasher can use Stealth and Toughness.

special_powers.name: MULTI-PURPOSE GAUNTLETS
special_powers.description: Night Thrasher can use Incapacitate. When he does and hits, after actions resolve hit targets are dealt 2 damage.

special_powers.name: TEAM BUILDER
special_powers.description: Night Thrasher can use Leadership. When he does, he is considered a higher point value than any friendly character with the New Warriors keyword.

special_powers.name: SHARE THROUGH THE WORLDMIND
special_powers.description: Friendly characters with the Nova Corps keyword can use Empower, but only to affect other friendly characters with the Nova Corps keyword.

special_powers.name: THE HUMAN ROCKET
special_powers.description: Give Nova a free action, and until the end of the turn, he can use Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking; and his speed value becomes 5 and is locked.

special_powers.name: WASHED AWAY
special_powers.description: At the end of your turn, if Sandman occupies a square of water terrain, deal him 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: QUICKSAND AND CONCRETE
special_powers.description: Sandman can use Barrier and Smoke Cloud. When he uses either, you may place Sandman on this card (his terrain markers remain on the map) and at the beginning of your next turn, place him in a square into which he placed on of these terrain markers. Sandman may not be placed on this card if he was on this card during the beginning of your turn.

special_powers.name: THERE'S ALWAYS A STAR BRAND
special_powers.description: When Starbrand is KO'd, choose another friendly character with a lower point value. That character modifies its combat values by +1 this game.

special_powers.name: WHAT IF I DON'T WANT TO?
special_powers.description: Starbrand can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast and Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: POWER TO BREAK A PLANET
special_powers.description: Starbrand can use Energy Explosion and Improved Targeting: Destroy Blocking, Opposing Characters, Adjacent.

special_powers.name: THE PITT
special_powers.description: When Starbrand is KO'd, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled, minimum result 2. Deal 3 penetrating damage to all characters within that many squares and then choose another friendly character. That character modifies its combat values by +1 this game.

special_powers.name: MINOR EXPLOSION
special_powers.description: Starbrand can use Quake. When he does, before rolling for the attack, you may choose to replace his damage value with 1 instead of 2 and if you do, damage dealt is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: MAJOR EXPLOSION
special_powers.description: Give Starbrand a double power action. Deal 2 penetrating damage to each other character within 2 squares and destroy all blocking terrain within 2 squares.

special_powers.name: ARE YOU GOING TO HIT ME WITH THAT... PIG?
special_powers.description: When Sersi targets or is targeted by a character, any relics or resources assigned to that character that would increase a combat value decrease it instead.

special_powers.name: TRANSFORM YOU INTO SOMETHING USEFUL
special_powers.description: Sersi can use Perplex. She can use it normally, or she may modify a combat value other than damage by +2 or -2.

special_powers.name: HIDE, WHEN I NEED TO
special_powers.description: Sersi can use Probability Control and Shape Change. When she uses Shape Change and occupies hindering terrain or is adjacent to blocking terrain, she succeeds on a 4 - 6.

special_powers.name: INVULNERABLE GASEOUS FORM
special_powers.description: Abyss can use Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: CREEPING DARKNESS
special_powers.description: Abyss can use Poison. When she does, deal each adjacent opposing character damage equal to its printed damage value, instead of 1.

special_powers.name: MOLECULAR LOCKDOWN
special_powers.description: Give Abyss a free action and target a character within range and line of fire. Until your next turn, the chosen character can't use Shape Change or have its combat values modified.

special_powers.name: WELCOME TO MURDERWORLD!
special_powers.description: When rolling to determine first player, no player receives a modifier to their roll. When on a map whose name includes "Arcade's Arena," at the beginning of the game you may start Arcade on click 7. If you do, Arcade has Power Cosmic team ability, can use Improved Targeting: Ignores Hindering, and other friendly characters have the Robot keyword for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: I CONTROL MURDERWORLD. SUCKS TO BE YOU.
special_powers.description: Arcade can use Energy Explosion and Precision Strike. If Arcade occupies a player's starting area, he can draw lines of fire and count range for his attack and damage powers from the square of any friendly character.

special_powers.name: THIS IS MY WORLD, YOU'RE JUST LIVING IN IT. FOR NOW.
special_powers.description: Arcade ignores Poison and all but 1 damage dealt to him from an attack. After Arcade is dealt damage from an opposing character, you may place him in any square within any player's starting area. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: HURRY TO EACH THREATENED WORLD
special_powers.description: Black Swan can use Phasing/Teleport. When she does, after actions resolve she can make a close combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: YOU HAVE FAILED TO STOP THE INCURSION
special_powers.description: Unless this click is revealed due to taking damage from an opposing character, immediately deal Black Swan 1 unavoidable damage. At the beginning of your turn, if Black Swan is the only character on your force, KO all opposing characters. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: MASTER OF ILLUSIONS AND TRICKERY
special_powers.description: Loki can use Shape Change and succeeds on a result of 4-6. When an opposing character targets Loki with Outwit or Perplex, he can use Shape Change as if he were targeted with an attack. When Loki makes a successful Shape Change roll, he can't be targeted for the remainder of the turn.

special_powers.name: TO TRICK MY BROTHER...AND HIS FRIENDS
special_powers.description: Loki can use Mind Control. When he does, he isn't dealt damage from it and, if he targets only a single character, modify Loki's attack value by +2 and he may target a character that can use Battle Fury.

special_powers.name: DEMONIC ARMS
special_powers.description: Give Master Pandemonium a power action when there are no Demonic Arm tokens on the map placed by him. Place up to 2 Demonic Arm bystander tokens as described on this card on the map within 5 squares and line of fire. For each of these tokens on the map, Master Pandemonium modifies his attack value by -1. When one of these Demonic Arm tokens is KO'd roll a d6 and on a result of 1 - 3, deal Master Pandemonium 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: SHOW YOU WHO'S BETTER
special_powers.description: When making a ranged combat attack, if all of Trick Shot's targets have either "sharpshooter symbol" or a range value of 7 or higher, modify his attack and damage values by +1.

special_powers.name: FBI AGENT... AND HAWKEYE'S BROTHER
special_powers.description: Trick Shot can use Shape Change and Stealth.

special_powers.name: IT'S AN AVENGERS WORLD
special_powers.description: Captain America and adjacent friendly characters with a lower point value and the Avengers keyword can use Leadership. If they are named Iron Man or Thor, they don't have to be adjacent or lower point value.

special_powers.name: LEADING BY EXAMPLE
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Energy Shield/Deflection. When another friendly character with the Avengers keyword uses Leadership and the result is 6, remove an action token from Captain America.

special_powers.name: SUPER SOLDIER SERUM
special_powers.description: Captain America can use Close Combat Expert and Empower.

special_powers.name: IT'S AN AVENGERS WORLD
special_powers.description: Iron Man and adjacent friendly characters with a lower point value and the Avengers keyword can use Defend. If they are named Captain America or Thor, they don't have to be adjacent or lower point value.

special_powers.name: LOBO, FAITHFUL WOLF COMPANION
special_powers.description: Red Wolf begins the game with Lobo attached. While Lobo is attached, Red Wolf can use Flurry. Give Red Wolf a free action to remove and place Lobo in an adjacent square.

special_powers.name: TRAINING A NEW CUB
special_powers.description: Give Red Wolf a power action when he has no action tokens and his Lobo has been KO'd. Reattach Lobo to Red Wolf's base.

special_powers.name: OWAYODATA CAME TO ME
special_powers.description: Red Wolf can use Combat Reflexes and Super Senses. If he's occupying hindering terrain, he can use Willpower.

special_powers.name: NEED TO BE SOMEONE ELSE FOR A WHILE
special_powers.description: Ronin is a wild card. Give Ronin a free action and replace him with any character of equal or lesser points named Blade, Echo, Hawkeye, Moon Knight, or Red Guardian on the same click number.

special_powers.name: NINJA TRAINING
special_powers.description: Ronin can use Charge, Flurry, and Stealth.

special_powers.name: MULTI-FACETED HERO
special_powers.description: Ronin can use Toughness and Willpower.

special_powers.name: IT'S AN AVENGERS WORLD
special_powers.description: Thor and adjacent friendly characters with a lower point value and the Avengers keyword can use Energy Explosion. If they are named Captain America or Iron Man, they don't have to be adjacent or lower point value.

special_powers.name: ABOMINATION OF MIDGARD
special_powers.description: Ragnarok modifies his attack and damage values by +1 when targeting a character with the Asgardian or Avengers keyword.

special_powers.name: THE THUNDER IS MINE!
special_powers.description: Ragnarok can use Impervious. When this power is first revealed, stop turning the dial and all opposing characters adjacent to Ragnarok are knocked back a number of squares equal to the damage dealt to Ragnarok this action. This power and its knock back can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: ENERGY DISCHARGE
special_powers.description: If Nightmask has taken damage since your last turn, modify his combat values by +1.

special_powers.name: TECHNO-COMMUNICATION
special_powers.description: Nightmask can use Mind Control. When he does, he doesn't need line of fire when targeting opposing characters with the Armor, Robot, or Vehicle keywords. Hit targets with these keywords modify their combat values +1 during the free action granted by Mind Control.

special_powers.name: ENERGY PORTALS
special_powers.description: Give Nightmask a power action and choose an unoccupied square within 6 squares. If that square is blocking terrain, the terrain is destroyed. Place Nightmask in the chosen square and he may make a close or ranged combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: EMBIGGEN
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose one: "giant damage symbol" and Super Strength, "tiny damage symbol" and Stealth, or "colossal damage symbol" and Close Combat Expert. Ms. Marvel has the chose combat symbol and can use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: POLYMORPH
special_powers.description: Ms. Marvel can use Shape Change. When she does, on a result of 6, you may heal her 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: ORIGIN BOMB
special_powers.description: Once per game give Ex Nihilo a double power action and place an Origin Bomb marker anywhere on the map. At the beginning of your next turn, deal 3 damage to each character and destroy each object, wall, and square of blocking terrain within 3 squares of the marker and then remove this marker from the game.

special_powers.name: CHLOROKINESIS
special_powers.description: Give Ex Nihilo a power action and place up to three hindering terrain markers in distinct, adjacent squares. The first marker must be within line of fire and all markers must be within range.

special_powers.name: TERRAIN MANIPULATION
special_powers.description: Ex Nihilo can use Telekinesis. If he uses it to place an object, he can immediately use Quake as a free action as if he occupied the square of the placed object.

special_powers.name: CREATE LIFE FROM FLORA
special_powers.description: Give Ex Nihilo a power action. Make a close combat attack targeting each opposing character within range that's occupying or adjacent to hindering terrain, dealing 3 damage to each hit character.

special_powers.name: INFINITY AND BEYOND
special_powers.description: If The Hood is played at 70 points, he is KO'd when he crosses the red KO line.

special_powers.name: INVISIBLE WHEN I HOLD MY BREATH
special_powers.description: The Hood can use Sidestep and Stealth. When The Hood has no action tokens, lines of fire can't be drawn to him by opposing characters 3 or more squares away.

special_powers.name: USING MY REALITY GEM TO ASSEMBLE THE GAUNTLET
special_powers.description: The Hood can use Probability Control, but only during your turn.

special_powers.name: USING THE GEMS TO KEEP MYSELF ALIVE
special_powers.description: The Hood can use Impervious. When this click is revealed, stop turning the dial. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: MASTER OF THE TIME STREAM
special_powers.description: Once per game, give Immortus a double power action and remove all action tokens from other characters of an equal or lower point value.

special_powers.name: AND I KNOW THE PAST
special_powers.description: Immortus can use Outwit, Probability Control, and Shape Change. When an opposing character uses Probability Control, deal that character 1 unavoidable damage after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: TRAVEL THROUGH SPACE AND TIME
special_powers.description: Korvac can use Phasing/Teleport. When he does, if he moves half his speed value or less, after actions resolve he may make a ranged combat attack as a free action, modifying his range value by -2.

special_powers.name: DOWNLOAD GALACTUS'S KNOWLEDGE
special_powers.description: Once per game, when this power is revealed, stop turning the dial. Korvac can use Invincible. For the rest of the game, Korvac can use Power Cosmic team ability, even if this power is lost. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: I SEE EVERYTHING
special_powers.description: Korvac can use Outwit, Perplex, and Probability Control.

special_powers.name: THE BRAIN OF THE WORLD'S GREATEST TELEPATH
special_powers.description: Red Skull can use Mind Control. When he does, he isn't dealt damage from it and after actions resolve, place an action token on one hit character.

special_powers.name: SCHATTENJAGER
special_powers.description: Red Skull can use Running Shot and Stealth.

special_powers.name: YOU HAVE MISSED YOUR ONE CHANCE
special_powers.description: Red Skull can use Combat Reflexes, Mastermind and Toughness. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: UNITE THEM WITH HATRED
special_powers.description: Red Skull can use Leadership. When he does and succeeds, choose a keyword. Opposing characters with the chosen keyword modify their defense values by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: NOVA HELMET TARGETING ASSIST
special_powers.description: Each turn, one friendly character with the Avengers keyword and another friendly character with the Nova Corps keyword can use Precision Strike, but only when targeting a single adjacent character.

special_powers.name: I'M PRETTY GOOD WITH BANK SHOTS
special_powers.description: When Steve Rogers targets a single opposing character with a ranged combat attack and hits, after actions resolve he may make a second ranged combat attack against a different character. When he does, he draws lines of fire and counts range from the first hit character's square.

special_powers.name: THE POWER OF THE NOVA FORCE
special_powers.description: Steve Rogers can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Invincible. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: ULTRA-DENSE ALLOYS
special_powers.description: When Iron Man an would be dealt damage, roll a d6 that can't be rerolled. On a result of 1, he can use Invulnerability; on a result of 2, he can use Invincible; on a result of 3 - 4, damage dealt is reduced by 3; on a result of 5 - 6, damage dealt is ignored.

special_powers.name: LASER REPLICATE
special_powers.description: Give Iron Man a ranged combat action with his damage value locked until actions resolve. After the ranged combat attack resolves, Iron Man may make a ranged combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC CONCUSSION
special_powers.description: Iron Man can use Outwit and has Improved Targeting: Hindering, Destroy Blocking, Characters.

special_powers.name: GIVE ME ALL THE CAMERAS
special_powers.description: Iron Man can use Outwit and has Improved Targeting: Ignores Hindering Terrain, Ignores Blocking Terrain. When a ranged combat attack resolves, any blocking terrain along its line of fire to the target is destroyed; Ignores Characters.

special_powers.name: LIMITLESS UNSTOPPABLE MIGHT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. On a result of 5-6, remove an action token from King Thor.

special_powers.name: I'LL SHOW YOU THE MEANING OF TRUE POWER
special_powers.description: King Thor can use Super Strength. Each time King Thor makes an attack and the attack total is 3 or greater than the target's defense value, after actions resolve, he may make a close combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: I CALL IT THE THOR-FORCE NOW
special_powers.description: King Thor can use Impervious. If this click is revealed when taking damage, stop turning the dial. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: THE LAST TITAN
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Super Strength and his powers can't be countered. Hulk begins the game with a Titan token on his card. Once per turn when Hulk damages an opposing character with an attack, place a Titan token on this card.

special_powers.name: HULK HATES WORLD
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Charge. When he does, he doesn't halve his speed value and can use Improved Movement: Hindering, Destroy Blocking, Characters.

special_powers.name: ONLY ONE THERE IS
special_powers.description: Hulk can use Invulnerability and, if he has no action tokens, Regeneration. When this click is revealed, stop turning the dial and remove a Titan token from this card. Whenever Hulk would take damage, remove a Titan token from this card instead. Hulk can't place additional Titan tokens on this card. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: DARK CLOUDS & DIRTY TRICKS
special_powers.description: Black Widow can use Stealth. Give Black Widow a free action and place 2 hindering terrain markers, one in her square and another within range and line of fire. These markers remain on the map until she uses this ability to place markers again.

special_powers.name: WE'RE THE SACRIFICE - WE WILL SAVE THE REST OF THE UNIVERSE
special_powers.description: Black Widow can use Combat Reflexes and Toughness. Whenever another friendly character is KO'd by an opposing character, you may heal Black Widow of 2 clicks.

special_powers.name: BACK TO THE BLOND-HAIRED BOWSLINGER NAMED HAWKEYE!
special_powers.description: Give Goliath a free action and replace him with any character of equal or less points named Hawkeye on the same click number minus 3, minimum 1.

special_powers.name: GROWING LARGER
special_powers.description: Goliath can use Quake. When he makes a close combat attack, all squares within 4 squares and line of fire are considered adjacent.

special_powers.name: GROUND SQUASH
special_powers.description: Characters hit by Goliath's attacks can't automatically break away and modify their break away rolls by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify range value by +2.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify speed value by +2.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify damage value by +1.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify range value by +2.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify defense value by +1.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify speed value by +2.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify defense value by +1.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify damage value by +1.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify attack value by +2 when making close combat attacks.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify defense value by +2 against ranged combat attacks.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify speed value by +3.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify attack and damage values by +1 when making a ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: Inspiration
special_powers.description: Modify speed value by +1. Modify attack value by +1 when making a close combat attack. Modify defense value by +1 against close combat attacks.

special_powers.name: Effect
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose either "tiny damage symbol" or "giant damage symbol". A single-based character with "starburst damage symbol" holding this object or in the same square as this object may be given a power action to equip it. This object can't be targeted by an attack. Character possesses the chosen symbol this game.
